episodes.title: EP. 207: CALIFORNIA - The Incest Family Murder Cult
episodes.description: In today's disturbing episode, we examine the story of mass murderer and child rapist Marcus Wesson, who led a campaign of terror and abuse against his own family members for decades, while at the same time preaching that he was a "vampire jesus". Listener discretion is advised.
